title: The Choice
description: Louise can't believe that Richard Beekman kept such a big secret from her and she is trying her best to get over him. However Richard will not allow her to get away from him and his magnetic touch.After a night out with Richard and Monique, Louise decides to go on a business trip with Richard to London. They spend a wonderful day together and Louise feels that she is falling in love.When a bad accident occurs, Louise has to make a choice and the consequences of her decision will affect them all forever.Readers should be 18 PLUS to read this short story.The books in the series are:1. The Wrong Bed2. The Deal3. The Choice
author: Helen    Cooper
